channel.title: Dragon Throwing Knife V2 [Blender][100% by me]
channel.description:
Still big noob at using blender oh and btw reply to this post with your own concept of a dragon throwing knife XD :cool: :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D Ohk So this is V2 of my Dragon throwing knife which was my first ever model this concept for the dragon throwing knife has two spike coming out of the sphere to give it a spin when thrown and make it go further and go in deeper into your target Here It Is Tell me what you think[img]http://i1233.photobucket.com/albums/ff382/michaelzzzzzz/DragonThrowingKnifeV2.png[/img]Tell Me wat you think(good feedback Pl0x)
to check out my first concept go to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471297.0.html

thanks im working on my V3

Also 3ds Max comes with some pretty helpful tutorial videos.[/quote]Will try when other laptop is fixed XD

@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“untelo, post:43, topic:375597”]I’m pretty new to modeling, heres something i put together.

Would fit in a 317 client well, though, I s’pose…

item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆, post:41, topic:375597”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=471532.msg3460125#msg3460125 date=1294408958]

Wow, i don’t think i have ever seen anything so simple with almost no skill you made this…

FAIL

You’re totally right. All the models you have had the courage to show to the public kick this one’s ass. Oh…wait.

Don’t be mean to the pro, he will get his epic modelling skillz out on us lul

woww who you referering to as pro if me than i cant accept it im newb and a half XD

I was referring to him and that we all better watch out he might get out his magical wishing tree rub it and then show his epic modelling skills :eek:
[/quote]
ooh can i get a magic thingy magigy[/quote]

You gotta ask him >>

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Throwing Knife V2 [Blender][100% by me]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:31, topic:375597”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=471532.msg3457023#msg3457023 date=1294108157]
Not bad, but try to make it look more like the real knife first, then add your own detail.

Rune_knife_detail.png662×900

I’m not saying make it as high detailed as that, but you should at least keep the original shape.
[/quote]
You sir are pro. You found RuneScape’s knife and added some google textures. I <3 you.[/quote]

No I actually did nothing xD.
This is a picture from runewiki.
I just posted it to remind him of what the real knife looked like, so he doesn’t get too off-task making it look ‘cool’.

Read full topic
